subject: Football
Concussions
Sports Medicine
Brain
Injuries (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Chris Henry has been identified by experts as the first player to have died with chronic traumatic encephalopathy, a brain disease, while still active in the N.F.L.
snippet: Chris Henry has been identified by experts as the first player to have died with chronic traumatic encephalopathy, a brain disease, while still active in the N.F.L.
